_An example of evolution of the TilesEngine_

= Details =

This game is an example to show how to move a Character in a 2D map.<br>
It is an evolution of the TilesEngine which allow you to move your Character in eight directions (only four directions in the original TilesEngine). It proposes more exception detections than the original game. (exceptions in function of the map and the character attributes).<br>
There is no project page created for this demonstration yet, but you can find the source here:<br />
